issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h5.Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a classic/alloy project in studio.
2. Make sure you have all services enabled.
3. Make sure you have the above mentioned modules versions. https://github.com/appcelerator-modules/ti.facebook/releases/tag/android-6.3.0
4. Build to android device/emulator.

h5.Actual results:
1. The build fails with error log:
{code}
[DEBUG] :  TouchTest : Process /Users/lchoudhary/Desktop/workspaces/workspace_2016/TIMOB-24532/plugins/com.soasta.touchtest.android/soasta/externalModules/facebook/6.3.0/copied-facebook.jar

2. If either of the modules is removed from the project, app builds successfully.

h5.Expected results:
1. The build should should be successful.
fields.summary: Android: Using facebook 6.3.0 & soasta 2.0 together causes build to fail
fields.environment:
Studio Ver:     4.10.0.201709271713
SDK Ver:        6.2.2.GA
OS Ver:         10.12.3
Xcode Ver:      Xcode 8.3.3
Appc NPM:       4.2.9
Appc CLI:       6.2.4
Ti CLI Ver:     5.0.14
Alloy Ver:      1.9.14
Node Ver:       7.10.1
Java Ver:       1.8.0_101
Devices:        ⇨ google Nexus 5 --- Android 6.0.1
                ⇨ google Pixel --- Android 7.1.1
Facebook Module: 6.3.0
TouchTest Module: 2.0

comments.body: I pushed a PR to the {{archiver}} repo to fix this: https://github.com/archiverjs/node-compress-commons/pull/27

Same issue exists when using soasta 2.0 & hyperloop 2.2.0 RC'X'. X is the RC version.
